description: This file defines a centralized routing class 'AppRouter' for a Flutter-based recipe application. It includes route names, a map of route to widget builder, a route generator for handling argument passing (specifically for the '/detail' route), and a data class 'RecipeDetailArgs' for passing recipe details between screens.

classes.name: AppRouter
classes.description: A static class providing route names, route map, and route generation logic for navigating between app screens.

classes.name: RecipeDetailArgs
classes.description: A parameter container for passing arguments to the recipe detail screen, either via recipe ID or the Recipe object itself.

methods.name: routes
methods.description: Returns a map of route names to widget builder functions for main screens.

methods.name: onGenerateRoute
methods.description: Handles routes that require arguments (specifically '/detail') and returns appropriate MaterialPageRoute objects.
